short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy to use Twitch Clips and VOD Downloader.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dwitch is an online tool to download VODs and clips from Twitch. The Dwitch extension makes it extremely easy to download videos from Twitch.

A Download button will appear on every video. Clicking on the Download button will take you straight to the download page where you can download any video from that particular post.
